vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in Private_Bank.cashOut (patch_16.sol#20-25):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender.call.value(_am)()) (patch_16.sol#22)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_16.sol#23)
